message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit more than I was hoping to spend.  Would you consider $90?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $110.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a little ways off from my budget. How about we try $100?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $115. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway again. How about we try $112.50?
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To be honest, $100 is really the highest I can go right now. If you're willing to accept that, I'm ready to make the deal.
Hi Bob, I understand you're willing to go up to $100, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for that price. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $105?
